metas.name: Apocalypse Now
metas.description: Similar to 'The Hurt Locker' and 'Inglourious Basterds' in its exploration of the psychological impact of war, but set against the backdrop of the Vietnam War.

metas.name: Full Metal Jacket
metas.description: Another strong war film focusing on the dehumanizing effects of conflict, like 'The Hurt Locker' and 'Inglourious Basterds', but with Stanley Kubrick's unique directorial style.

metas.name: War Dogs
metas.description: Combines elements of war themes from 'Three Kings' and dark comedy, presenting a satirical take on arms dealing during wartime.

metas.name: Edge of Tomorrow
metas.description: Combines action and sci-fi elements similar to 'The Running Man' and 'Sonic the Hedgehog,' with a time-looping twist.

metas.name: Shaun of the Dead
metas.description: Blends horror and comedy like '28 Days Later' and some of the user's more comedic selections, offering a British take on the zombie genre.

metas.name: Hot Fuzz
metas.description: An action comedy with a strong mystery element, reminiscent of 'Ace Ventura' and 'Get Shorty,' featuring Edgar Wright's signature style.

metas.name: Zombieland
metas.description: Balances horror and comedy elements, making it a good fit given the user's enjoyment of both genres (like in '28 Weeks Later' and 'KPop Demon Hunters').

metas.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
metas.description: A witty, fast-paced crime comedy with a mystery at its core, similar to 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura,' but with a more modern edge.

metas.name: In Bruges
metas.description: A dark comedy with crime elements that might appeal to fans of 'Get Shorty' and 'Wake Up Dead Man,' featuring sharp writing and strong performances.

metas.name: The Nice Guys
metas.description: A comedic crime thriller with buddy-cop dynamics, similar to 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura,' known for its sharp dialogue and chemistry between the leads.

metas.name: Primer
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller that shares elements with 'The Running Man' and '28 Weeks Later' due to its dystopian themes.

metas.name: Looper
metas.description: Combines action, science fiction, and thriller elements, similar to 'The Running Man' and '28 Weeks Later,' with a unique time travel premise.

metas.name: Children of Men
metas.description: A dystopian thriller with strong action elements, similar to 'The Running Man' and '28 Weeks Later,' set in a near-future world facing societal collapse.

metas.name: Prisoners
metas.description: A dark and intense thriller with a strong mystery element, appealing to fans of 'The Shawshank Redemption' and 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Parasite
metas.description: A darkly comedic thriller with social commentary, potentially appealing to fans of 'Get Shorty' and the comedic edge found in movies like 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Memories of Murder
metas.description: A thriller from Bong Joon-ho, known for its blend of dark humor and suspense, appealing to those who liked 'Get Shorty' and the horror elements in 'V/H/S/Halloween'.

metas.name: Lucky Number Slevin
metas.description: A crime thriller with comedic elements and plot twists, reminiscent of 'Get Shorty' and 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Identity
metas.description: A psychological thriller with a mystery element and surprising twists, similar to 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Oldboy
metas.description: A revenge thriller that is both brutal and stylish, appealing to fans of dark themes and suspense found in 'Inglourious Basterds' and 'V/H/S/Halloween'.

metas.name: Arsenic and Old Lace
metas.description: A classic dark comedy with elements of crime and mystery that could appeal to those who enjoyed 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura'.

metas.name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
metas.description: A satirical black comedy about the Cold War, appealing to those who enjoyed the war themes in 'Three Kings' combined with comedic elements.

metas.name: Brazil
metas.description: A dystopian science fiction film with dark humor and social commentary, similar to 'The Running Man' and some of the darker themes found in the user's watched list.

metas.name: A Fish Called Wanda
metas.description: A British comedy with crime elements and quirky characters that might appeal to fans of 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura'.

metas.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
metas.description: A visually stunning and quirky comedy with a mystery element and a war backdrop, similar to elements from 'Three Kings' and 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
metas.description: Combines action, comedy, and fantasy elements, appealing to the blend of genres seen in movies like 'Sonic the Hedgehog 3' and 'KPop Demon Hunters'.

metas.name: Kick-Ass
metas.description: A superhero action comedy with over-the-top violence and humor that fits with movies like 'The Meteor Man' and 'Sonic the Hedgehog 3'.

metas.name: Attack the Block
metas.description: A British sci-fi action comedy with alien invasion elements that could appeal to fans of 'The Meteor Man' and the comedic aspects of 'Sonic the Hedgehog 3'.

metas.name: Tucker & Dale vs Evil
metas.description: A horror comedy that subverts genre tropes, appealing to those who enjoy both horror and comedy elements like in '28 Days Later' and 'KPop Demon Hunters'.

metas.name: Train to Busan
metas.description: A fast-paced and intense zombie horror film that resonates with the user's enjoyment of '28 Days Later' and '28 Weeks Later'.

metas.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
metas.description: A mystery thriller that is dark and suspenseful, with elements of crime, similar to 'The Shawshank Redemption' and 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: Prisoners of the Ghostland
metas.description: Starring Nicolas Cage, it's a wild mix of action, martial arts, and bizarre visuals - similar to 'The Running Man', but way weirder.

metas.name: Army of Darkness
metas.description: A horror-comedy classic. Combines fantasy, horror, and slapstick violence, similar to 'Meteor Man' and 'V/H/S/Halloween'.

metas.name: Death Proof
metas.description: A thriller with action and horror elements, directed by Quentin Tarantino. Likely to appeal given 'Inglourious Basterds'.

metas.name: Snatch
metas.description: A British crime comedy with a fast-paced plot and dark humor, similar to 'Get Shorty' and 'Ace Ventura'.

metas.name: Seven Psychopaths
metas.description: A dark comedy about crime and screenwriting, with eccentric characters, like 'Get Shorty' and 'Wake Up Dead Man'.

metas.name: The Guard
metas.description: An Irish black comedy crime film with a strong lead performance, sharing DNA with 'Get Shorty' and similar dark comedies.

metas.name: Extraction
metas.description: Raw action thriller with strong combat and a gritty feel. May appeal to fans of The Hurt Locker due to intensity and war-time like conditions.

metas.name: Upgrade
metas.description: Dystopian world combined with brutal action, with elements of revenge that appeal to fans of The Running Man and Inglourious Basterds.

metas.name: Dredd
metas.description: Futuristic action thriller set in a sprawling urban dystopia. Appeals to fans of dark themes combined with lots of action like The Running Man.

metas.name: District 9
metas.description: Socially conscious, and a Sci-Fi Action like Sonic but with aliens. Appeals to both action and science fiction fans.
